welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Southold, a charming town known for its quaint streets, scenic beaches, and rich history. We invite you to explore and discover all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at East Hampton Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at East Hampton Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Suffolk County Airport handles all commercial flights and includes amenities such as restaurants, shops, and lounges.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Suffolk County Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights at Montauk Airport.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private jet owners and offers luxurious amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New London Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New London Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at New Haven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at New Haven Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brookhaven Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brookhaven Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
